trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There was one other sighting in Philadelphia on or around July 1st 2008
Summary: I saw a boomerang shaped object hovering over an area near the Oxford Valley Mall.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at a swim meet near the Oxford Valley Mall on July 1 at about 9 PM. My one friend pointed to the sky and said "what is that thing in the sky." It looked like a boomerang and had red and white flashing lights. It was hovering in place. I thought it was just an odd shaped plane. We all agreed and just continued on with our swimming. I read an article about it in the Bucks County Courier Times. I remembered my encounter last night and realized that it was important that I e-mail MUFON.
